verbose_text: To investigate the PNS induced downregulation of Dpysl2 protein and the effects of PG treatment, we performed western blot analysis (XREF_FIG) and immunohistochemical anlaysis (XREF_FIG) of the prefrontal cortex areas of the brains of rats in the control, PNS and PG group.
